text_block_list.text:
—— Here, we exist. Here, our presence is radiant. Fates myriad 
entwine, here, 'cross aeons, on the far side of providence.

Hear now, hear now. O flames, 
ye gathered here, O pillars trine.
Lend thine ears and eyes to this night.

From ages past to end of days, 
our Sacred Equine Relay runs ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: —— Yo, did you hear? The Sacred Equine Relay is making a return at this year's Festival of Illustrious Equines!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
The Sacred Equine Relay is that thing, right? That one event 
where retired horsegirls write wishes on hoofplaques and 
offer them to a fire ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: —— Oh, I heard a rumour about that～ They say this year the Sacred Equines for it are gonna be Tracen students～

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
For real? Isn't being chosen as Sacred Equine a good omen? 
Lucky～ I have a race coming up so I wanna join too!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
—— Gratitude! To all of you for joining me 
from your busy schedules!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Unusual outta-the-blue gathering this is, huh? 
With all these familiar folks around no less ——

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Eh well, don't that make things quicker? 
—— So, what do ya need us for?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Disclosure! As you may have already heard, for the first 
time in several years the Sacred Equine Relay will feature 
at this Festival of Illustrious Equines!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
—— If I remember well, the Relay is a ceremony of horsegirls, 
for horsegirls, by horsegirls, to honor and appease the wishes 
of earlier generations under watch of the Three Goddesses.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! It is a mystical and time-honored ceremony 
composed of two rituals; the Threading of Memories, 
and the Dash of Remembrance!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
On this occasion, the five chosen to take on 
the responsibility of Sacred Equines are ——

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: —— Tamamo Cross! Oguri Cap!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Inari One! Mejiro Ardan! Yaeno Muteki! 
Congratulations are in order!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
What……!? This ancient and noble duty 
has been entrusted to the five of us……!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
I am beyond honored. It would seem that rumors 
regarding the Sacred Equines being selected from 
among Tracen Academy students did hold weight.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
The five of you will soon depart for lodgings 
at a special camp to prepare yourselves for 
the Sacred Equine Relay!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Blessings upon you! I hope you will wholeheartedly fulfill 
this duty, as representatives of not only Tracen Academy, 
but all horsegirls of your generation!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—— Hmm. If I got stuff right, that Sacred Equine 
Relay's goin' down on a mountain so we best pack 
some bug spray, nah……?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Then let's grab the stuff we use at summer camp. 
… Huh, what's on with ya, Oguri? Why you starin' 
at them sweets like that?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Nothing, I'm just wondering how many snacks I should bring.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: You think we goin' on a field trip?! Man ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyhow, ain't it crazy to find ourselves together like this? 
Thought it usually gets decided by fortune telling or some such. 
How's those odds, huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad we're all together. I don't really understand 
all that Sacred Equine business, but I want to live up 
to the expectations of being chosen.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I'll do fine when I'm with Tama and everyone else. 
So I'm happy, it's reassuring to be chosen together.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Da-ha-ha-ha! Straightforward as ever, Oguri! Ain't no noble duties changing the look on 'er face!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ha, you're always rolling like this, ain'tchu… 
Well any case, I'll back you up on the reassuring bit.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That Sacred Equine omen stuff actually caught my attention. 
Now we in this, we're gonna make sure nobody's done better!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But we're going to special lodgings, huh. 
…… I hope they have good food there.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: We ain't going on vacation!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… How did your grandmother respond?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
"Do your duty well", is what she has conveyed to me. 
…… My resolve is strengthened once more.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…… Hehe. More than your resolve, it would seem 
to me that your spirits have lifted considerably. 
… You have had your tail raised rather high up.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
That's… umm… Embarrassing as it is, while receiving this 
noble duty is a great honor, I also feel strongly about the 
once-in-a-lifetime opportunity given to me.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Both as a horsegirl and adherent of the Kongo Yaegaki school, 
't would bring me the greatest happiness to be able to strike 
a proud figure for my grandparents.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…… Speaking of which, I have noticed that 
I am not the only one in lifted spirits.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Mmph. Indeed, I feel much the same honor and excitement. To be able to spend my time with you all at these lodgings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Let us endeavor to make this trip worthwhile and deliver 
a Sacred Equine Relay for the history books.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes, certainly.
